☛ *Build morphological parsers for Biblical Hebrew*.

::: {.callout-warning}
 ⚠️ In addition to being highly incomplete, this documentation should be considered provisional and subject to change until the first release of `Luhot.jl` in the Julia general registry. ⚠️

`Luhot.jl` is a Julia package for building Hebrew morphological parsers. It is currently in an early design phase. This documentation will track the development of the package.
